attributes.action: instigate a boycott of France, the French and French goods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following the news that the French Government has not invited the British Royal family to the 65th anniversary of the the D day landing despite the sacrifies made by members of Britain and the Commonwealth to protect and free their country after their surrender and collaboration (Vichy Government) handed it and nearly Europe to the Germans. The French Government advised President Nicolas Sarkozy was focused on the 'main event' of hosting U.S. President Barack Obama. If this is the case and they feel the appropriate way to say thank you is to snub us then we too should snub them with a boycott of everything French

rejection.details: Prince Charles was invited to represent the royal family.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
